pullRequest.title: Unify Town and Nation code, and introduce new Eco Account Mechanics

commit.message:
Merge branch 'master' into refactor-bank

# Conflicts:
#	src/com/palmergames/bukkit/towny/command/TownCommand.java
#	src/com/palmergames/bukkit/towny/event/NationTransactionEvent.java
#	src/com/palmergames/bukkit/towny/event/TownTagChangeEvent.java
#	src/com/palmergames/bukkit/towny/event/TownTransactionEvent.java
#	src/com/palmergames/bukkit/towny/invites/InviteHandler.java
#	src/com/palmergames/bukkit/towny/object/Resident.java
#	src/com/palmergames/bukkit/towny/object/Town.java
#	src/com/palmergames/bukkit/towny/object/Transaction.java
#	src/com/palmergames/bukkit/towny/object/inviteobjects/NationAllyNationInvite.java
#	src/com/palmergames/bukkit/towny/object/inviteobjects/PlayerJoinTownInvite.java
#	src/com/palmergames/bukkit/towny/object/inviteobjects/TownJoinNationInvite.java
#	src/com/palmergames/util/StringMgmt.java

Clean up

- unused imports
- undo orphanged residentList->owner renames
- remove unused method in Town object.
Unify Bank methods and provide defaults.
Introduce a new generified event BankTransactionEvent for listening to *any* bank transaction.
Make sure BankTransactionEvent has static handerlist.

nodes.bodyText: the apostrophe has to be replaced with whatever character code is need. Or make "there is".

commit.message: Fix misc javadoc errors that were leftover.
Introduce new territory for code consolidation between towns and nations.
Add new SpawnLocation interface and more cleanup

Cleanup Commit

Removes unused imports
Re-adds renamed methods as deprecated to maintain compatibility.
Format code to what is standard in Towny.

Merge remote-tracking branch 'origin/refactor-bank' into refactor-bank

# Conflicts:
#	src/com/palmergames/bukkit/towny/object/Town.java
Add observer for account transactions to separate auditing code.

Make most objects return unmodifiable lists, this will prevent untracked and dangerous writes to objects.

- Document ResidentList
Add auditing mechanics to Town and Nation
Add iterator support for TownBlockOwner and ResidentList
Add economy adapter to interface with multiple eco implementations.
Flesh out more debt methods add debt prefix config setting.

nodes.bodyText: Feel like the tag should be trimmed anyway, then just perform an isEmpty check.
At this point it might just be more valid to abstract the method to return a Collection<TownBlock>
Can probably simplify with a ternary expression
Unless there is further logic planned to be added in that if-statement, can probably be simplified to return withdraw(...) && collector.deposit(...):
Is this supposed to be private?
Is this supposed to be private?
Also, I am not sure why an account needs to be created if it doesn't exist, if the end-goal is to mimic deleting the account...
Are these TODOs for a later PR?
Could probably move the double diff out of the if-statement and change it to Math.abs(amount - currentBalance)
Probably should be an else if
I believe this is not supposed to be here...

You could just merge this with the above if-statement.
If you don't want to do that, then can attach an else-if for control flow and remove the continue statement.

commit.message: Add iterators because tb lists are gone.
Add initial proper eco bank support.

Revert "Add initial proper eco bank support."

This reverts commit 9c838ae8
Refactor things that are useless and/or serve no purpose, and adjust naming.
Remove commented code, add back missing exception.
